arStrings.szText: Lost Legacy
A crusader seeks to rid the Zakarum Fortress of evil.
Ksenia has entered the Defiled Halls. I should follow her.
Follow Ksenia in to the Sealed Quarters

Ksenia believes we can purify the Zakarum Fortress, returning it to its previous glory.

However, the halls are quiet, blanketed by a quiet darkness. We should search deeper into the Defiled Halls.
Find the source of corruption within Sealed Quarters
Inspect the paladin remains
Defeat Mathias, Corrupted Paladin
Ksenia and I were attacked by the corrupted spirit of a paladin. Mephisto's essence has cursed them.
Speak with Ksenia

A great betrayal has cursed the paladins' spirits, but Ksenia believes she can purify the spirits allowing them to rest in peace. 

We have found the focal point of Mephisto's magic within the Sealed Chambers. I must place the cursed blades so Ksenia may begin the ritual.
Place the cursed blades for Ksenia's ritual: {DONE}/{NEEDED}

A great betrayal has cursed the paladins' spirits, but Ksenia believes she can purify the spirits allowing them to rest in peace. 

The ritual has begun. The wrathful spirit of Carthas attacked us. I must protect Ksenia so she may finish the ritual.
Defeat Carthas, Corrupted Paladin
Ksenia completed her ritual, allowing the paladins here to rest.
Speak with Ksenia

A great betrayal has cursed the paladins' spirits, but Ksenia believes she can purify the spirits allowing them to rest in peace. 

Mephisto's corruption has seeped into their weapons. We must find these cursed blades.
Collect Mathias' Betrayal
Collect Eleazar's Choice
Collect Alodia's Wrath

Ksenia believes we can purify the Zakarum Fortress, returning it to its previous glory.

A ominous note from the paladin Carthas warns us of the evils ahead. It seems the paladins guarding Sankekur's tomb fell to Mephisto's corruption.
Find the source of corruption within Sealed Quarters
Read the Urgent Letter

A great betrayal has cursed the paladins' spirits, but Ksenia believes she can purify the spirits allowing them to rest in peace. 

Cursed weapons in hand, the ritual must be preformed at the curse's root: where hatred is strongest.
Search for the curse's root
Inspect the paladin remains

A great betrayal has cursed the paladins' spirits, but Ksenia believes she can purify the spirits allowing them to rest in peace. 

We have found the focal point of Mephisto's magic within the Sealed Chambers. I should speak with Ksenia when I am ready to begin the ritual.
Speak with Ksenia to begin the ritual
